code: import React from'react';import{Sidebar,SidebarHeader,SidebarTitle,SidebarContent,SidebarMenuContent,SidebarToggleButton,ConversationMenuItem}from'../../shared/styles/GlobalStyle';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const VaultSidebar=_ref=>{let{selectedItem,onSelectItem,isCollapsed,onToggle}=_ref;const menuItems=[{id:'sentences',label:'문장'},{id:'memos',label:'메모'},{id:'letters',label:'편지'},{id:'qa-updates',label:'QA 업데이트'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Sidebar,{width:"280px",$isCollapsed:isCollapsed,$variant:"conversation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SidebarHeader,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SidebarTitle,{$isCollapsed:isCollapsed,children:"\uC800\uC7A5\uACE0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SidebarToggleButton,{onClick:onToggle,children:isCollapsed?'→':'←'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SidebarContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SidebarMenuContent,{children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConversationMenuItem,{$isSelected:selectedItem===item.id,onClick:()=>onSelectItem(item.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text",style:{display:isCollapsed?'none':'inline'},children:item.label})},item.id))})})]});};export default VaultSidebar;
